We apologize for the bad experience and inconvenience. For us to review your concern, kindly send us a direct message with your email address and your phone number attached with your Uber account, so we can further assist.

Sorry about the trouble. Phone support is currently available in selected locations. Please send us a DM with your email address and additional information regarding your concern, so we can further assist you.
Sorry to hear about that. Please confirm your email address/phone number and order number via DM so we can further assist.

Sorry about the trouble. If Uber cash are on but less than the bill amount, the leftover amount will be charged to your account (Credit/ Debit Card) or by cash.
